mapper.insert: Insert into study values (STUDY_SEQ.nextval, #{study_name}, #{study_place}, #{study_info}, #{study_people} ,TO_CLOB(#{study_detailInfo}), default, #{study_start_date} , #{study_end_date}, #{study_tag}, default, #{area_code},#{study_category_code})
mapper.select: select study_no, study_name, study_info,study_create_date, study_start_date, study_end_date, study_recruitment_condition from study ORDER BY STUDY_CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM study
ORDER BY STUDY_CREATE
ORDER BY STUDY_NO
ORDER BY STUDY_NAME

select s.study_no, s.study_name, s.study_place, s.study_info , s.study_people, s.study_detailinfo, to_char(s.study_create_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') study_create_date , to_char(s.study_start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') study_start_date, to_char(s.study_end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') study_end_date , s.study_tag, s.STUDY_RECRUITMENT_CONDITION, s.AREA_CODE, s.STUDY_CATEGORY_CODE, spp.nick_name from study s LEFT join (select * from STUDY_PARTICIPANT sp join PROFILE p on sp.MEMBER_ID = p.MEMBER_ID where auth_code = 1) spp on spp.study_no = s.study_no where STUDY_NAME LIKE '%'||#{study_keyword}||'%'
and STUDY_CATEGORY_CODE = #{category_code}
and SYSDATE between STUDY_CREATE_DATE and STUDY_START_DATE
and SYSDATE between STUDY_START_DATE and STUDY_END_DATE
and SYSDATE > STUDY_END_DATE

select count(*) from study where STUDY_NAME LIKE '%'||#{study_keyword}||'%'
and STUDY_CATEGORY_CODE = #{category_code}
and SYSDATE between STUDY_CREATE_DATE and STUDY_START_DATE
and SYSDATE between STUDY_START_DATE and STUDY_END_DATE
and SYSDATE > STUDY_END_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDY_COMMENT VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(STUDY_COMMENT_NO)+1, 0) FROM (SELECT STUDY_COMMENT_NO FROM STUDY_COMMENT WHERE STUDY_NO=#{study_no})) , #{member_id}, #{study_no}, #{study_comment}, SYSDATE, #{study_comment_origin}, #{study_comment_level}, #{study_comment_seq})
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDY_COMMENT SET (#{study_comment}, SYSDATE, #{study_comment_origin}, #{study_comment_level}, #{study_comment_seq}) WHERE STUDY_NO=#{study_no} AND MEMBER_ID=#{member_id} AND STUDY_COMMENT_NO=#{study_comment_no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM STUDY_COMMENT WHERE STUDY_NO=#{study_no} AND MEMBER_ID=#{member_id} AND STUDY_COMMENT_NO=#{study_comment_no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM STUDY_COMMENT WHERE STUDY_NO=#{study_no} AND MEMBER_ID=#{member_id} AND STUDY_COMMENT_NO=#{study_comment_no}
mapper.insert: insert into STUDY_PARTICIPANT values(sp_seq.nextval, sysdate, null, null, #{member_id}, #{study_no}, #{auth_code});
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDY_PARTICIPANT SET (AGR_DATE, OUT_DATE) = (#{agr_date}, #{out_date}) WHERE agr_number = #{agr_number}
mapper.select: select count(*) from STUDY_PARTICIPANT where STUDY_NO = #{study_no} and AUTH_CODE = 2

select AGR_NUMBER, REQ_DATE, AGR_DATE, OUT_DATE, sp.MEMBER_ID, STUDY_NO, AUTH_CODE, NICK_NAME, INTRO from STUDY_PARTICIPANT sp join PROFILE p on sp.MEMBER_ID = p.MEMBER_ID where STUDY_NO = #{study_no} and AUTH_CODE = 2
mapper.delete: delete from STUDY_RESERVER where study_no = #{study_no} and member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: select sr.STUDY_NO, sr.MEMBER_ID, TO_CHAR(sr.REQ_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REQ_DATE, sr.REQ_COMMENT, p.NICK_NAME, p.INTRO, pi.PROFILE_IMG_ROUTE from (select * from STUDY_RESERVER where MEMBER_ID = #{member_id} and STUDY_NO = #{study_no}) sr join PROFILE p on sr.MEMBER_ID = p.MEMBER_ID left join PROFILE_IMG pi on p.NICK_NAME = pi.NICK_NAME
